name: Grand Fleuve Boutique
address: E101 SUN PLAZA GRAND WORLD HA LONG STREET, Hạ Long, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm giáp biển, Grand Fleuve Boutique cung cấp chỗ nghỉ 4 sao ở Hạ Long, đồng thời có hồ bơi ngoài trời, trung tâm thể dục và sân hiên. Ngoài nhà hàng, chỗ nghỉ còn có quầy bar và bể sục. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tại Grand Fleuve Boutique, các phòng đều đi kèm với ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Hằng ngày, chỗ nghỉ có các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu lục địa cho bữa sáng.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Bãi Cháy, Cáp treo Nữ Hoàng và Khu Du lịch Giải trí Sun World Hạ Long. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cát Bi, cách Grand Fleuve Boutique 43 km.

review.rating: Will never forget it… and all for good reasons
review.comment_positive:
Very clean and well kept. Breakfast was superb with good food, well displayed and excellent staff.
I have been in a few hotels, but never experienced a staff like the one at this property. From the moment you walk in through the moment you check out you are treated as the king of the castle. It feels sort of that you are the only guest and you have all these extraordinary people pampering every moment. And those receptionists… what a caring group of people. They all treated me as if I were special to them, while I felt they were all very special to me. The key in customer service , I guess relays in the details

Also there were two instances of me ordering a drink on the rooftop, only for the waitress trying to overcharge me and having to ask for her to go back and change the receipt. Once is a mistake, but twice makes me think this was deliberate.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Grand Fleuve, a beautiful hotel with lovely staff who were very helpful and always went above and beyond for our family. The restaurant provides a great buffet breakfast that has many delicious options (Vietnamese and Western).

review.comment_positive: The hotel itself is a beautiful building, with spotless rooms and a stunning reception. Staff were friendly and very helpful. Our motorbike was stored inside which I appreciated. It was quiet, the beds were comfortable and the bathroom was lovely.
review.comment_negative: The location itself is like setting foot in Chernobyl. There is literally nothing unless you drive 15 minutes into the town. We were the only guests in the hotel, apart from one other poor soul. The streets are empty and devoid of any life. Everyone seems surprised to see you, which can make you feel uncomfortable sometimes. It is Chinese investment firms who build these beautiful towns, but there is nobody to staff them and there are no visitors. It is a ghost town. Do yourself a favour and stay on Cat Ba.

review.comment_negative:
Jeden Tag stand die Rezeption auf der Matte, um sich nach  angeblich entwendete Handtücher zu erkundigen.
In einem Hotel dieser Preisklasse mehr als unangenehm und unangebracht.
Das Hotel war fast leer, daher gibt es sicherlich Sorgen im finanziellen Bereich. Dies darf nicht auf die Gäste projiziert werden.
Der Nachtclub am Strand beschallt jeden Abend die gesamte Umgebung. Wir sind durch die Bässe bis zum späten Abend fast aus dem Bett gefallen. Sehr störend!
Zum Ende wurde uns vorgeworfen, am Abend zuvor ein Plastikteil der Dusche zerstört zu haben ( die wir nicht einmal genutzt hatten, da wir den Tag im Aquapark waren). Der Umgang wegen Kleinigkeiten wie dieser oder den ewigen Handtuchterror hat uns den Aufenthalt gründlich verhagelt.
Wir waren als Familie dort und empfehlen dieses Haus nicht weiter.

They also sent us in the wrong direction to get much needed refreshments after our trip there from Hanoi.

review.rating: Opulent beauty in a ghost town
review.comment_positive: I got given the honeymoon suite (unusual for a solo traveller, but I'll take it) and it was beautiful. The bathroom was very clean and modern, with a high-tech bidet (not a dodgy hose contraption thing, but a panel to select water temperature, direction etc). The room had excellent wiring (panels to select lights in the room, not typical suspicious electrical wiring). Breakfast was delicious, a great variety and freshly made eggs as you like them. The restaurant was very clean and spacious, and the staff were lovely and helpful. The hotel itself is immaculate and the art throughout the hotel was definitely a highlight, it was just stunning.
review.comment_negative:
I had to pay for a towel that got hair dye on it (equivalent of about $15 AUD). I get colour wash-out all the time at home, and I know the hair dye washes out easily in a regular wash. I understand that the staff wouldn't have known this however, so I was happy to pay for the towel. But my hairdresser will be getting words from me.

Heads up also - Ha Long is a ghost town. Heaps of totally empty buildings and half-built high rises, but barely a person to be seen during the day. Barely any traffic (which was nice, but unnerving after being in Saigon and Hanoi). There also seems to be a lot more rules about smoking and cleanliness than in other parts of Vietnam. I kind of got the feeling North Korea would have a similar vibe to this place.

review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng ngon, sạch sẽ

Die Zimmer waren wirklich hervorragend!

一入住即受到服務人員的熱烈歡迎（會用熱烈一詞是因為總經理還特別來接待...），飯店內各個設備都非常新，且因為去的時候非旅遊旺季因此人很少，幾乎像是獨享了頂樓游泳池、三溫暖、健身房、餐廳等等，能用這樣的價格享受到這麼優秀的飯店真的十分划算。
另外，房間內的床和枕頭真的非常舒服，飯店周遭的環境也整治得很棒，能在淡季造訪下龍市是一個很棒的體驗。
早餐的部分則因為住客少，改以點餐方式而非自助吧，但早餐品質很好，非常好吃。
推薦給去完下龍灣不想立刻回河內的旅客，可以多在下龍市停留一晚，並且選擇 Grand Fleuve Boutique 作為留宿點，度過悠閒且舒適的一晚。
review.comment_negative: 作為五星級飯店，一些小細節似乎可以再更注意一些，包括備用零錢的準備量（因為有購買水所以用現金付款，但零錢不足告知需要用信用卡）、櫃檯人員的英文水平，但我相信應該是當地旅遊業尚未完全發展起來的關係，未來一定會更好，整體來說瑕不掩瑜！

review.rating: Highly recommended if you can choose the right room to avoid the noise from the beach at night
review.comment_positive: I love almost everything about the hotel. It's very new, clean and beautiful. The design of the rooms is tasteful and they are well-maintained. The staff are helpful, especially a male staff called Lễ. He went out of his way to support us when my sister got a cold and needed some medicine. Thank you so much Lễ. The buffet was great too.
review.comment_negative: Unfortunately, (and it's not the hotel's fault anyway) but the noise from the bars from the beach was very very loud from 8pm up to 3am. I wish the hotel could do something about it but I understand it's out of their control. It also depends on which room you have, I chose a room with a window so maybe that's why. My parents' room (no window) is in another direction and luckily they couldn't hear anything.
The surroundings were noisy until midnight.

review.rating: A very affordable fancy hotel with all amenities.
review.comment_positive:
It looked like everything was new at this hotel and at this area in general, so that was nice. The room was spacious and the bathroom as well, with one of those fancy toilets that have a bidet included, which was an experience. The weather was a bit chilly when we were there so we didn't use the pool but they had a very small gym, which was equipped enough for a quick workout. 

The breakfast choices were amazing, all the food was very delicious!
review.comment_negative:
They gave us an interior room, which meant the room window was to an inner aisle of the hotel, where guest pass. It was a weird choice and in retrospective I should've said something because clearly there were empty rooms that had windows to the exterior. We were there only one night so in the end it was whatever, but this stayed on my mind.  

This type of hotel is the kind that was made for old upscale European tourists or then Chinese people looking for that vibe. The city of Halong is still being developed so it is hard to say whether this was a good location or not. Not a lot was going on around it, for sure.

review.comment_positive: The hotel feels very new, bed was insanely comfortable, the pool and gym were very nice! Very close to the beach.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast was buffet the first day, but the second was menu. They rented a scooter that broke a bit after, but they gave the support needed and replaced. The only thing is the location: feels like a ghost town.

review.comment_negative:
Le service et le personnel ne sont pas à la hauteur, l’hôtesse du restaurant est scotchée à son téléphone, idem pour le préposé à la piscine qui hausse les épaules quand on lui dit qu’il y a plein de saleté dans la piscine… et qui s’empresse de retourner sur son téléphone…
A titre d’exemple, au retour d’un restaurant le soir vers 22h nous avons demandé si il était possible d’avoir quelques glaçons, on nous a répondu sèchement que non car la cuisine était fermée !  Nous sommes aujourd’hui à Danang ( Hôtel Alina ) avons fait la même demande au retour du resto et cela a été livré directement dans notre chambre endéans 3 minutes .
Je comprends désormais pourquoi Grand Fleuve Boutique a perdu sa 5ème étoile ! A ce rythme là ils vont rétrograder à 3 étoiles .
Un bon manager serait le bienvenu pour redonner le sourire et l’envie de travailler au personnel de l’hôtel !
